name: 555 (LDJAM 43)
description:
555 is a basic action RPG where the player is tasked with sacrificing various degrees of victims! I tried going a bit more loosey goosey for this LDJAM because there pressure of creating a 'clever' concept can crush fun before I've even started developing. 

The game may be a bit strange but that's how I like it, please let me know what you think!

(This game was made in 48hrs for Ludum Dare 43: Sacrifices must be made.)

Version  1.2 is the most current version although it was not released before the deadline, same for version. They contain bug fixes.
